mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.LOGINNAME, A.PASSWORD, A.NAME, A.SEX, A.STATUS USER_STATUS, A.CTIME, A.REMOVED, A.EXT1, A.EXT2, A.EXT3, C.ROLE_ID, C.ROLE_NAME, c.role_code, C.STATUS ROLE_STATUS, F.MENU_ID, F.URL, F.NAME MENU_NAME, F.PARENT_MENU_ID, F.ICON1, F.ICON2, F.description, F.PRIORITY, F.STATUS MENU_STATUS FROM APP_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_USER_ROLE B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_ROLE C ON B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_ROLE_PERMISSION D ON C.ROLE_ID = D.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PERMISSION E ON E.PERMISSION_ID = D.PERMISSION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_MENU F ON E.PERMISSION_RESOURCE_ID = F.MENU_ID AND E.PERMISSION_TYPE = '1' WHERE a.status = '1' and a.removed= '0' and A.LOGINNAME = #{loginname} AND f.status='1'

SELECT A.USER_ID, A.LOGINNAME, A.PASSWORD, A.NAME, A.SEX, A.STATUS USER_STATUS, A.CTIME, A.REMOVED, A.EXT1, A.EXT2, A.EXT3 FROM APP_USER A WHERE a.status = '1' and a.removed= '0' and A.LOGINNAME = #{loginname}

SELECT A.RESOURCE_ID, A.RESOURCE_CODE, A.RESOURCE_NAME, A. STATUS FROM APP_RESOURCE A, APP_PERMISSION B, APP_ROLE_PERMISSION C, APP_USER_ROLE D, APP_USER E WHERE A.RESOURCE_ID = B.PERMISSION_RESOURCE_ID AND B.PERMISSION_TYPE = '2' AND C.PERMISSION_ID = B.PERMISSION_ID AND D.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND E.USER_ID = D.USER_ID and e.status = '1' and e.removed= '0' AND E.LOGINNAME = #{loginname}

SELECT C.* FROM APP_USER A, APP_USER_ROLE B, APP_ROLE C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND A.STATUS = '1' AND A.REMOVED = '0' AND B.STATUS = '1' AND C.STATUS = '1' AND A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.role_ID, A.role_code, A.role_name, A.STATUS, E.resource_id, E.resource_code, E.resource_name, E.STATUS resource_status, D.MENU_ID, D.URL, D.NAME MENU_NAME, D.PARENT_MENU_ID, D.ICON1, D.ICON2, D.DESCription, D.PRIORITY, D.STATUS MENU_STATUS FROM APP_ROLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_ROLE_PERMISSION B ON A.ROLE_ID = B.ROLE_ID and B.STATUS = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PERMISSION C ON B.PERMISSION_ID = C.PERMISSION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_MENU D ON C.PERMISSION_RESOURCE_ID = D.MENU_ID AND C.PERMISSION_TYPE = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_RESOURCE E ON C.PERMISSION_RESOURCE_ID = E.RESOURCE_ID AND C.PERMISSION_TYPE = '2' WHERE 1=1
AND A.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
select IFNULL(max(cast(dict_val as unsigned int)),0) from app_dict_detail where dict_code=#{dictCode}

SELECT a.notice_id, a.notice_type, a.notice_title, a.notice_content, a.user_id AS user_id_a, ( SELECT NAME FROM app_user WHERE user_id = a.user_id ) name_a, a.ctime AS ctime_a, a.removed, b.notice_user_id, b.notice_read_time, b.notice_isread, b.user_id AS user_id_b, ( SELECT NAME FROM app_user WHERE user_id = b.user_id ) name_b, c.notice_attachment_id, c.fileName, c.ctime AS ctime_c, c.extName, c.url FROM app_notice a LEFT OUTER JOIN app_notice_user b ON a.notice_id = b.notice_id LEFT OUTER JOIN app_notice_attachment c ON a.notice_id = c.notice_id WHERE a.notice_id = #{noticeId} order by a.ctime DESC
